title: Tristana will never be in my game again, until she is nerfed
body:
Originally, I hate Vayne, still do, but my hate for Trist has grown considerably.

i want to make you all aware.

It first started when I returned not so long ago, and I seen trist and she had a double jump, initially I was impressed a positive change, and not only that, it was more of a strategic challenge to go against, which is something I always enjoy!

But then game, after game, after game, Trist is in every single 1, team mate or enemy, and another thing I noticed even if we lost, she was 15/2, 10/5, 3/0.

She seems to be strategically impaired and her death rate has dropped considerably, at least in my games.

So, to make my life much easier I ban her every game, to avoid those people who don't want to think or conjure up some strategy to actually have to do the latter.

Vaynes ban rate has increased a lot since I last played, which is amazing, so glad everyone sees how cancerous she is!

I would like you all to consider banning Tristana too, just so the games are a bit more diverse. and maybe a nerf would be incoming too.


:)

replies.body: Wait until tomorrow when they ship the new Jinx. You're going to hate her more.
At least Jinx doesn't have mobility and great self peel
She technically does. Fleet Footwork, Her passive both increase move speed. She doesn't NEED to peel, because if she's Excited, she tears teams apart from 820 range.
I'd rather deal with movespeed than the leaps and knock backs of Vayne and Tristana

I don't think you understand. Get Excited raises Jinx's Move speed by 175%. From her meta build, before Soft Cap scaling, that's 1250 or so move speed. Turns out to be close to 925 Move speed considering soft Speed caps. That means her move speed bonus is stronger than any dash, knock backs, etc. If excited, she will pass 3 attacks per second, and will be able to move twice as fast as you. This is why Jinxes who got takedowns pre patch become monsters. Now, her attack speed is back to being part of her Q, so she will always have it. Once she has Rapid Fire Cannon, she's going to literally own your games.
You may be waiting a long time.
